text: Satya Pal Malik (born 24 July 1946) is an Indian politician. He was the Governor of Meghalaya and 18th Governor of Goa from 2019 to 2020. From 2018 to 2019, he was Governor of Jammu and Kashmir. From 2017 to 2018, he was Governor of Bihar. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Meghalaya Category:Governors of Goa Category:Governors of Bihar Category:Governors of Odisha Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Satya Pal Malik
